vulnerabilities.title: Smoothie vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting when tooltipLabel or strokeStyle are controlled by users
vulnerabilities.description: The package smoothie from 1.31.0 and before 1.36.1 are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) due to improper user input sanitization in strokeStyle and tooltipLabel properties. Exploiting this vulnerability is possible when the user can control these properties.
